definition: an inn in some eastern countries with a large courtyard that provides accommodation for caravans
details:
noun
- an inn in some eastern countries with a large courtyard that provides accommodation for caravans
= example: an inn in some eastern countries with a large courtyard that provides accommodation for caravans
= synonyms: caravansary
- a title given to rulers or other important people in Asian countries
= example: a title given to rulers or other important people in Asian countries
